title: Designing Serverless Search Pipeline with DynamoDB, SQS, Lambda & OpenSearch/Elasticsearch
summary: A practical breakdown of how to build a scalable, low-latency serverless search pipeline using DynamoDB streams, SQS buffering, AWS Lambda processors, and OpenSearch for indexing high-volume data in real time.

title: How Billions of Username Lookups Have Handled
summary: An exploration of the engineering strategies behind efficiently handling billions of username lookups, including indexing techniques, caching, sharding, and system-level optimizations for high-traffic applications.

title: Goodbye asyncHandler: Native Async Support in Express 5
summary: A quick guide to Express 5â€™s native async/await support and how it eliminates the need for wrappers like asyncHandler, simplifying error handling and modernizing Express-based applications.
